dev.releaseinfo: Development Version, install on your own risk! Please create a backup before installation

beta.releaseinfo: Initial Release Version - new versioning and installation routines
Troubleshooting for blocking the covers in the selection, display network status, operation of shutdown and restart in the admin touch area
DietPi Dash, IP Control Backend, Image resize after installation, Bug fixes Validation, monitor and cloud
Telegram buttons, new telegram functions, chromium parameters, radio changed to other, new ui for adding media, bugfixes
Telegram makeover, MQTT support, Resume makeover, UI makeover for adding media, MuPiHAT supportm PWM-Fan support, new themes and many more...
